project.description: Automatically recommend software engineering tools to developers of open source software projects.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: wget -nc https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/com/google/errorprone/error_prone_ant/2.3.1/error_prone_ant-2.3.1.jar wget -nc https://github.com/GumTreeDiff/gumtree/releases/download/2.0.0/gumtree.jar wget -nc http://central.maven.org/maven2/org/eclipse/jgit/org.eclipse.jgit/4.9.0.201710071750-r/org.eclipse.jgit-4.9.0.201710071750-r.jar wget -nc http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/com/jcabi/jcabi-github/0.38/jcabi-github-0.38-jar-with-dependencies.jar wget -nc http://central.maven.org/maven2/com/jcraft/jsch/0.1.46/jsch-0.1.46.jar wget -nc http://central.maven.org/maven2/org/apache/commons/commons-email/1.3.1/commons-email-1.3.1.jar wget -nc http://central.maven.org/maven2/javax/mail/mail/1.4.7/mail-1.4.7.jar sudo cp -n {dir}/.github.creds . ; sudo chown jenkins:jenkins .github.creds sudo cp -n {dir}/.email.creds . ; sudo chown jenkins:jenkins .email.creds export PATH=$PATH:{mvn} sudo javac -cp jcabi-github-0.38-jar-with-dependencies.jar:error_prone_ant-2.3.1.jar:gumtree.jar:org.eclipse.jgit-4.9.0.201710071750-r.jar:jsch-0.1.46.jar:commons-email-1.3.1.jar:mail-1.4.7.jar com/chbrown13/tool_rec/ErrorProne.java com/chbrown13/tool_rec/Tool.java com/chbrown13/tool_rec/Error.java com/chbrown13/tool_rec/Recommender.java com/chbrown13/tool_rec/Utils.java com/chbrown13/tool_rec/Comment.java java -cp .:jcabi-github-0.38-jar-with-dependencies.jar:error_prone_ant-2.3.1.jar:gumtree.jar:org.eclipse.jgit-4.9.0.201710071750-r.jar:jsch-0.1.46.jar:commons-email-1.3.1.jar:mail-1.4.7.jar com.chbrown13.tool_rec.Recommender $USER $REPO
